Articles.Content: What would you use three wishes on if you where granted three wishes?

Unlimited Wishes

The Ability to manipulate time

A sort of code to stop my unlimited wishes occurring any time

unlimited wishes

an army of daleks

becoming the ultimate dalek

Having $10000000000000000000000000000000000000000 dollars

getting a better comptuter

live a good life.
The best luck possible. I don't care about the other two.

Massive budget increase for NASA

A trip to Mars

Contact from another intelligent lifeform

Assuming we have the age-old standing of "you can't wish for more wishes",

The ability to wish for more wishes

More wishes

I'd have the exact amount of money in my pocket for all purchases I make.

Unlimited Wishes

Unlimited Money

Kerbal Space Program was Real life (With a Respawn code in place )

Unlimited wishes

Universe domination

Infinite youth

Unable to EVER die

Perfect Wife

TARDIS

huge time-traveling, other universe fighting army (with uniforms)

Unlimited resources and instantaneous travel

Ultimate gaming computer (works instantly, all knowledge is on it, I can control all the universe with it)

That's all i can think of right now.....

Unlimited genies !

Wish for being RICH

To train and go into space.

Because when I was in school we played this but was never allowed to say unlimited wishes

Being a god.

You only need one wish to get everything.

i wish for...

UBER GENIOUS

UBER STRENGTH

and all of the money in the world
The matchless theme, is pleasant to me

Ability to minipulate Space-time

Ability to bring idea's to real-life regardless of scientific impossibility

Telepathy

-To be the superior overlord of all universes

-To have an intellect superior to all others

-To have every super power ever (including the ability to grant wishes)
